name: Drive 21
description:
DRİVE 21 is a simulation game. By earning money with job opportunities, by making logistics and bus driver, by buying and modifying your own vehicle with the money you earn, you can make your own vehicle and you can travel with your own vehicle with open world driving experience.

FEATURES
-Vehicles With Realistic İnterior And Driving Physics.
-Realistic Sounds And Realistic Engines.
-Vehicle Customizations (Engine parts, Body parts, Car color, Rims, Tires)
-Open World.
-Realistic Traffic.
-Realistic Weather Dynamics and Weather Conditions (Rain, Snow)
-Vehicle Damage System.
-Hunger And Thirst System.
-Barbecue And Camp System.


Contact info: QuadfixStudio@outlook.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/gfrdrT
